message: i'm afraid i didn't see anyone using at to build his websites, but i hear that it's so professional
@blazeeboy Yeah, it's a bit more focused towards corporate sites I guess. But it could be used for most sites around. More info at http://typo3.org/ :)
me... I work in TYPO3 for many years

@mayeco Nice to meet a fellow Typo3 developer here :) Where are you from if I may ask? I'm from the Netherlands. And would you be interested in starting or having a Typo3 group/channel here on Convore?
@koopa58 I'd recommend just opening one (if there isn't one out there already). They are easy to start. If there is interest, people will join, no?
@atourino Yeah, I did :) I probably should have just posted it here, but didn't want to spam.. anyway, Typo3 people, please join https://convore.com/typo3/ :)
@mayeco Cool, nice to see people joining :)
